org.json
Class HTTPTokener

java.lang.Object
  org.json.JSONTokener
      org.json.HTTPTokener

public class HTTPTokener
extends JSONTokener

The HTTPTokener extends the JSONTokener to provide additional methods for the parsing of HTTP headers.

Version:
2010-12-24
Author:
JSON.org
